title: Senior Architect Lead Developer (Salaried) - Travel Services

responsibilities.responsibilty: Lead/Architect of offshore developers to create a mobile app on IOS and Android platforms using C# and Xamarin.
Architected back-end APIs in Azure using Azure SQL Server, Functions, Azure App Service, Azure API Manager (APIM) using .Net
Developed security authentication transfer using JWT tokens with Azure Microservice Functions for Login and customer
Designed and developed C# .Net Core 3.1 Web Services to pass Sql Server generated JSON data mobile phone app and
Azure Dev-ops administrator to create CI/CD builds and pipelines of projects and their publishing.
